title: It's OK to be deaf
creator_credit: Peter Brighton and Institute of Educational Administration
brief_description: Records the attempts by the mother of a profoundly deaf student to obtain adecuate schooling for her daughter within a normal school environment. Underlines the importance in particular of not treating children with hearing impairment as different from children without hearing impairments.
